SELECT N.NOTI_ID, M.USER_NAME, N.TITLE, N.ENROLL_DATE, N.ESSENTIAL FROM NOTICE N LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON M.USER_NO = N.WRITER WHERE N.STATUS = 'T'
AND N.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND N.CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND M.USER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
ORDER BY N.ESSENTIAL DESC, N.NOTI_ID DESC
